Description:
Design Excellence with Quality and Versatility!!!
Impeccably stylish, fabulously sun-swept and immediately inviting, this spacious 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home offers superior single-level living with a special appeal to all. Superbly situated on block of 410m2(approx) with a stunning landscaped garden frontage.
Discover a sunlit kitchen and meals area featuring stainless steel appliances and extended island stone bench top, this home is sure to be a focal point for entertaining. The roomy comforts of open-plan living and dining spill outside to a positively peaceful undercover decked alfresco area. This home provides a welcoming and protected space that will be enjoyed for relaxed dining and entertaining all year round.
This magnificent 28sq (approx) home features the following:
* Master bedroom with a stunning Ensuite with double vanity, oversize shower, separate toilet, a massive walk in robe with shelving.
* Additional 3 large bedrooms with BIRs
* Spacious open-plan living and dining area
* Stylish kitchen with high gloss cabinetry, extended island stone bench top, mirrored splashback, 900mm gas cook top, oven, under mount range hood, dishwasher and an extra large walk in pantry.
* Separate laundry with plenty of cupboard space.
* Huge central bathroom with bathtub and a separate toilet.
* Undercover alfresco area with low maintenance backyard and sideyard.
* Remote-controlled double lock up garage with internal and rear access.
Packed with handy additions and special features include, 21 solar panels, 5 sensor alarm system, Hider hose ducted vacuum system, intercom, Security cameras x8, refrigerated multi-zoned heating and cooling installed with e-zone (controlled over the phone, each individually zoned rooms), Clipsal zen series electrical switches and power points, Crimsafe security doors and fly screens, communications board in garage, tv points and data points in every room, led lighting around mirror in en-suite, downlights throughout, sensored wall lights throughout the corridors, sensored pantry light, laminate timber flooring, tiles to ceiling in bathrooms and much more.
This property needs to be on your must see list!
Contact Lem Djemal on 0427 579 365 to register your interest and avoid missing out.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus

* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Titled Land In Merrifield
No need to wait in dark years for and to be titled, this land is titled and ready to build. Located in the highly sought after Merrifield Estate with easy access to the Metropolitan Ring Road or Hume Highway. Walking distance to the upcoming M Square Shopping Precinct which will offer health and lifestyle services, local amenity services plus much more. A very short stroll to the newly and uniquely built Pinnacle Park, just minutes from Schools, Community Centres and Sporting facilities, 20km to Melbourne International Airport, and easy easy access to Melbourne CBD - the list is endless.
Call Ronit 0418 342 931

Description:
The pinnacle of the north
Upon entry to this amazing single story residence you will be instantly comforted by its 'homely feel'. jam packed with quality features, no stone has been left un-turned when building this near new master piece. Situated in a prestigious estate of Craigieburn, you should come check this home out before its sold.
Main Features include:
- Three large living zones
- Kitchen with: under mount sink, Calcutta stone bench tops, pendant lights, stainless steel appliances ( two ovens and electric cooktop), dishwasher and large walk in pantry with sink
- Two bathrooms with tile from floor to ceiling and outstanding quality throughout
- Ducted vacuum system
- Ducted heating an refrigerated cooling (heating/cooling is individually zoned to each room and is wifi controlled)
- Beautiful alfresco zone with outdoor kitchen and ceiling fan
- Alarm system and an abundance of down lights internally/externally
- polished concrete flooring
- Amazing sheer curtains through-out
Preferred sale terms:
settlement - 45/60/90 days
Deposit - 10%
Ali Celik
04314894438
ali.celik@harcourtsrp.com.au

Description:
The Opportunities Are Endless.
Don't miss this opportunity to book yourself this premium block of land in the heart of the Annadale Estate. Sitting on an allotment of 415m2 (approx.), this beautiful parcel of land has a lot more to offer than just space.
Annadale is set in a location brimming with opportunity, diversity and prosperity, which allows you the space to be yourself.
It celebrates a truly scenic landscape, merging nature with thoughtful development. Set to comprise more than 1200 homes, Annadale will be the ideal community for your brand new home.
Conveniently located near the future Mickleham Town Centre, current plans for Annadale include a primary school, sports facility, two parks, playgrounds and integrated walking trails through the woodlands. This will be on top of the already established range of schools, shopping centres, recreational facilities and other amenity located nearby.
Call us today!
Dheeraj Vedhara 0414 351 344
Preet Brar 0416 085 144

Description:
Perfect Family Home in a Prime Locale!
Welcomed by pristine landscaped garden and conveniently located in a sought after pocket in Roxburgh Park within walking distance to the new Woolworths Complex, parklands, schools and public transport. This magnificent single storey home featuring separate entrance with high ceilings and parquetry timber floors running throughout, 2 separate living zones including formal lounge, good size kitchen that overlooks open plan living, meals and family area plus rumpus / theatre zone with access to outdoor entertaining area and plenty of space for the growing family to enjoy, 4 good size bedrooms (master with full ensuite and WIR), central bathroom, separate toilet, spacious laundry, side driveway leading to a double garage with internal access and drive through access. All sitting on 546sqm allotment.
Fixtures and fittings including: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, s/steel appliances, dishwasher, downlights, timber Venetians, and much more.

Description:
Big Family Home
Positioned perfectly In a quite court, sits this beautiful family home located only minutes walking or driving distance to Roxburgh Park Shopping Center, Roxburgh Park train Station and close to Homestead Shops as well as all major family and house hold needs.
The family will enjoy the space and free flowing floor plan that caters for both the young and old.
The home has three separate living zones including
family living, lounge and a huge rumpus room for all the family to enjoy. Four bedrooms one of which the Master bedroom has a walk in robe and en-suite, three remaining sizeable bedrooms that have the luxury of bir's and a central bathroom to share. Well appointed Kitchen with ample bench space that overlooks a spacious dining area currently seating 8 people, and not mention, lovely manicured gardens.
On approximately 545m2, backyard is super important for youth and for family entertainment with an undercover pergola area featuring paved flooring and garden beds for season fresh veggies.
Extras include - Ducted heating, Evaprotive cooling, 5kw Solar pannels, 3000ltr water tank, Gas appliances, Timber floors, Tiled wet areas, Awning blinds all around, Double remote control garage with drive through access, Garden shed and a Back to base securing alarm system.

Description:
Designed for Modern Day Living!
3-minute drive to Donnybrook train station, This beautiful brand new light-filled home designed for modern-day living, built on (30sq plus built area approx.) will impress even the fussiest of buyers.
Built to the highest of standards this home is immaculately designed this 4 bedroom home is nothing but elegance and luxury. In addition, this property brings a great blend of style, luxury and elegance spares no expense and with a layout giving enough room for a growing family and is ideally located in a prime, prospering, beautifully placed, and well-established suburb, "Donnybrook" hosts a load of benefits.
Ample living areas with a separate lounge and a study upon grand entrance, all generous in size which makes this magnificent home perfect for entertaining guests. Comprising 4 stunning bedrooms, all complete with fitted built-in robes, sparkling central bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles. A large master bedroom that features a generous walk-in-robe & impressive ensuite making this home the perfect setting for some peace and leisure for all.
The most luxurious hostess kitchen comes equipped with a 60mm waterfall stone benchtop and a generous size Walk-in Pantry. The elegant kitchen overlooks to a generous size meals area and living space, add to that your very own alfresco to entertain family and friends all year round with a huge low maintenance rear yard and perfect al fresco you can dream of.
Architectural refinement and the finest craftsmanship brings new magnificence to this truly prestigious family residence.
OTHER KEYS FEATURES INCLUDE
- 2700mm high ceilings
- Downlights throughout house
- Refrigerated heating cooling throughout the house
- Front and back landscape include
- Exposed aggregate concrete in the front yard
- 900mm Kitchen appliances
- Dishwasher included
- 60mm stone in the kitchen and in bathrooms
- Plenty of storage throughout the house
- Perfect size alfresco with huge backyard
Come and view this elevated and elegant family home that's certain to attract an assortment of potential buyers
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Description:
MODERN | LOCATION | TWO KITCHEN
Positioned in the highly desirable Lakeside Estate, within minutes to Craigieburn Central and list of important amenities. This home is one of the hottest to hit the market so don't miss it. This spectacular family home denotes quality at every turn.
The feel of modern lifestyle living, this residence offers sleek and spacious luxury low maintenance living. Cleverly configured to accentuate natural light, this free-flowing 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home effortlessly combines the contemporary comforts of sunlit open-plan living, whilst delivering a high level of sophistication and style.
Upon stepping through the front door, you are greeted by the grand entrance, .There are four massive bedrooms, the Master suite features a large walk in robe, stunning en-suite, double shower and floor to ceiling tiled walls, while three bedrooms offer mirrored built in robes. Separate laundry with ample storage space. the list goes on! A light filled living and dining area include tile floors, and an open plan kitchen featuring quality stone benches, the latest soft closing cabinetry, SSA appliances, dishwasher and lets not forget the walk in butlers pantry. This home truly has it all, Sliding doors that open up to an absolutely beautiful alfresco with a 2nd kitchen having stone bench top and storage cabinets underneath ,leading out to the no maintenance rear yard that is sure to impress you.
Other features include
Fully functional second Separate kitchen with storage in alfresco
A secure double lock up garage with internal access,
Ducted heating, Refrigerated Cooling,
Square set ceilings throughout and only the absolute highest quality possible.
All of this and much more, located only seconds away from a beautiful walking track, soccer and football oval, public BBQ area within very close proximity to all key amenities, Schools, Transport and Craigieburn Shopping centre .
Make sure that 37 Lemon Myrtle, Craigieburn is on your shopping list.

Brand New Affordable Home
Bombay Real Estate is proud to present 10 MOTTLECAH CIRCUIT, CRAIGIEBURN .The quality & Style of this 3 Bedroom house will impress you . With a vibrant, charismatic personality & engineered designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living.
Comprising a well appointed kitchen with Stone Bench Tops & stainless steel appliances overlooking the meals/family area, Master Bedroom with walk in robe and remaining bedrooms with BIR'S, double lock up garage with internal access plus much more. Outside surrounded by a low maintenance backyard. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including Newbury Primary school, Aitken Creek Primary School, child care facility, and other local amenities be quick to inspect ! Description:
Spacious Family Living in a Great Location!
Standing tall on approximately 532sqm allotment in a great location with walking distance to schools and the new Woolworth Complex. this very well designed double storey brick beauty features offers quality and space for the growing family to enjoy.
Featuring grand entrance with high ceilings and tiles running throughout, 2 large living zones including formal lounge, large Tamanian Oak kitchen that overlooks meals and family area with access to large entertaining area and plenty of space for the growing family to enjoy, 5 Large bedrooms (master with full ensuite and all with BIR's), separate retreat upstairs with access to a good size balcony, third bathroom downstrairs, spacious laundry, side driveway leading to a single garage.
Fixtures & fittings including: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, reverse cycle cooling, alarm system, curtains, kitchen appliances dishwasher, garden shed, second outdoor kitchen and much more.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
A Gem in a Haystack
This Metricon built beauty, set on a large allotment of approximately 519m2 is instantly inviting and surprisingly spacious, this family-friendly entertainer offers so much more than initially meets the eye. Prepare yourself for a luxury lifestyle with additional indoor/outdoor living areas in this supersized 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home with Aitken Creek Primary School literally at your doorstep.
Beyond a welcoming entrance hallway and a versatile floor plan the home spectacularly opens up to reveal spacious open-plan living and dining alongside a sparkling kitchen boasting high-quality stainless-steel appliances and a sleek stone-topped island bench, perfect for entertaining.
Instantly shift into relaxation mode with a second living area/rumpus that is looking out to a fully decked pergola/ entertainment area closed off with zip blinds for the family to enjoy all year round. This all-weather area will be used on a daily basis for private lounging, informal dining and memorable celebrating.
The main bedroom is graced with a walk-in robe and a fully renovated en-suite with his and hers double basins and tiles to ceilings, while the remaining 3 robed bedrooms are privately zoned to one side of the home, peacefully tucked away behind a connecting hallway and accompanied with a child retreat and the central bathroom.
Additional features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, a remote-controlled 2-car garage offering internal and external entry, laminate timber flooring, landscaped gardens, window furnishings, down-lights throughout, garden shed, intercom, camera surveillance system with 6 cameras, separate laundry and WC.
Location couldn't get any better with all key amenities within minutes away. Close proximity to local schools, childcare centres, restaurants, shopping centres, parks, library, Splash aquatic centre, gyms, transport and much more
Contact Lem Djemal on 0427 579 365 to register your interest and avoid missing out.

In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. Description:
Titled 350m2 In Olivine Estate!
Situated in the ever popular 'Olivine Estate' is an opportunity not to be missed!
This beautiful TITLED land measuring 350m2 with 12.5m frontage will allow you to build the dream home that you have been waiting for!
> A stone throw away from Hume Anglican Grammar (Now Open), and future Childcare
> Olivine Cafe, General Store & Community Space coming soon
> Play in Green Spaces - Gumnut Adventure Playground - opening soon
> Two Ovals, Cricket Nets, Netball Courts & Sporting Facilities
> Planned Town Centre, Supermarkets & Specialty
Stores
> Future Neighbourhood Parks, Walking & Bike Trails
> Access to Melbourne CBD via Hume Freeway
> Convenience of Craigieburn Central & Plenty Valley Shopping Centre, being only a short driving distance!
Call us today, before this is sold!

Description:
Brand New Affordable Home
A fantastic opportunity to purchase this brand new home designed to accommodate a growing family and first home buyers and investors. This magnificent home boasting three bedrooms with the master comprising of a WIR and ensuite, spacious living area and a fabulous kitchen featuring 900mm appliances, 40mm stone bench tops and dishwasher. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, LED downlights,front and back landscaping, double remote garage with internal and external access and lots more.

Description:
This is the One Double Master !
This picture-perfect contemporary masterpiece is a promise of tranquility, comfort and luxury. Situated on a quiet family-oriented pocket in Mickleham, you will find this executive modern but superior home offering designer charm. Beautifully zoned, the versatile floor plan emphasizes large scale gatherings with 2 light filled living zones accompanied by an inviting blend from inside to out. Located in the Botanical estate with access to the estates facilities such as a Shopping centre and oval.
Upon the grand welcoming entrance you will be greeted with a generous proportion formal lounge with a view to convert to a 5th bedroom. Be enthralled with an elegant and well-appointed kitchen equipped with stone bench tops, a butler's pantry, 900mm stainless steel appliances flowing onto the family room leading to a large alfresco.
You will find 4 bedroom accommodation comprising of an exquisite 2 master suite with a large walk-in custom robe and ensuite. Strategically planned a lounge/kids' retreat in the formal with 2 additional full-size bedrooms with built in robes.
Modern and easy to clean tiled bathrooms for your extra comfort and easy maintenance. A large family bathroom of equal quality and style with a pearly white bath, conveniently serves the remaining three bedrooms at the rear of the interior.
Last but not the least, decent size backyard, with low maintenance gardens delivering the perfect serenity for private relaxation or family gatherings.
Additional luxury highlights include:
Smart wiring
Infinity hot water
Ducted heating and evaporative throughout
Easy clean wooden flooring to ground level
Double garage
This home is absolutely stunning fitted with quality and quantity, inspections are a must!
Landscaping For Illustrative Purposes Only
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers -
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Build your Dream Home on 567 m2 !!
Titled, Ready to build your dream home on a MASSIVE 567m2 flat land. Situated in the popular Aston Estate, you have the ability to bigger a large home without compromising on space and location.
This parcel of land is close by the Craigieburn Central, Splash Aquatic and Leisure Centre, Public transport, and abundance of schools both private and public, beautiful parklands and walking tracks. This very ideal location will surely make you the envy of all your friends.
Call now to enquire, This One will not Hang Around For long!
First Home Owner may be eligible for up to $35K Grant!
